thread.title: 7 Sad Attempts at the New Secret Starbucks Matcha Pink Drink
thread.title_full: 7 Sad Attempts at the New Secret Starbucks Matcha Pink Drink

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: 7 Sad Attempts at the New Secret Starbucks Matcha Pink Drink
text:
Last week a new secret Starbucks drink ‚Äî the Matcha Pink Drink ‚Äî started to dominate social media with its beautiful two-tone pink and green coloring. The only problem? The Matcha Pink Drink isn't nearly as beautiful IRL as it is on Instagram. (Such is life.)
Thanks to the Instagram photos, people are expecting the drink, which is a Strawberry A√ßai with coconut milk and matcha, to be pink on top and green on the bottom.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below SECRET MENU ITEM‚ÄºÔ∏è The #PinkDrink is sooo 2016 üòâ 2017 is about 2-toned @starbucks drinks like the #MatchaPinkDrink üçµüíï 3 parts traditional Pink Drink (Strawberry Acai Refresher with coconut milk) on top of 1 part matcha coconut milk on the rocks üòã Do you know a cool Starbucks Secret Menu drink? Tell me about it üëá #dailyfoodfeed üì∑: @dailyfoodfeed üìç: @starbucks üëª: dailyfoodfeed üëá TAG A STARBUCKS ADDICT üëá
A post shared by Home of #DailyFoodFeed (@dailyfoodfeed) on Feb 17, 2017 at 7:44am PST
But when they order IRL, people are getting green vomit-looking drinks that are v. disappointing. Here are some examples of how the drinks are turning out:
1. "Don't be fooled by food dye and faked Insta pics."
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Please don't be fooled by food dye and faked Insta pics. If you order the matcha pink drink, this is what it will actually look like. Also, a venti is $7.90 pre-tax. Just a heads up. Edit: it tastes okay, but there are 60 grams of sugar in a venti so, yeah. #matchapinkdrink
A post shared by Sarah (@sarahjayaz) on Feb 20, 2017 at 5:13am PST
2. Matcha Pink Drink Green Drink
It's the latest craze the #matchapinkdrink #starbucks #3scoopsofmatchainthepinkdrink #yourewelcome
A post shared by @legsnthai on Feb 20, 2017 at 10:22pm PST
3. "Not as pretty as advertised, but still tasty."
#matchapinkdrink not as pretty as advertised, but still tasty. #starbucks #secretmenu
A post shared by Erick (@coppersoffit) on Feb 20, 2017 at 7:11am PST
4. More like a white-and-green drink.
#Matchapinkdrink #ombre #starbuckssecretmenu ‚òïÔ∏èmade by: @sranefan
A post shared by Patricia (@patriciaquach_) on Feb 19, 2017 at 10:53am PST
5. Expectation VS reality.
#starbuck #secretmenu #matchapinkdrink #socialmediavsreality #heartbrokenüíî #tastegoodthough #expactationsvsreality
A post shared by Polly (@polly_fallen_angel) on Feb 19, 2017 at 2:37pm PST
6. This doesn't look appetizing.
This was such a fail but whatever #MatchaPinkDrink
A post shared by  ã…®ƒãt÷Ö Ä…®a  üa ç (@xx.victoria.lam.xx) on Feb 20, 2017 at 6:29pm PST
7. "It did not come out nearly as appeasing to the eye."
Ordered the #MatchaPinkDrink and it did not come out nearly as appeasing to the eye but it IS DELICIOUS!!! üå∏üçµüå∏
A post shared by Elizabeth Kincaid (@elizabeth_kincaid) on Feb 18, 2017 at 12:49pm PST
I did find a Matcha Pink Drink that came out beautifully, and the photo was taken by the barista who made it. "I don't recommend asking your barista to make this for you," she wrote in her caption. "They will hate you."
Yes I made one. No I don't recommend asking your barista to make this for you. They will hate you #matchapinkdrink
A post shared by Mandy (@miranda_rights24) on Feb 20, 2017 at 12:03pm PST
I think the takeaway here is that if you're looking for a photogenic drink, stick to the Pink Drink.
